document.full_text: president barack obama issued an impassioned call for immigration reform in a speech at the u.s.-mexican border on tuesday, sending a message to hispanics whose votes he needs to win re-election next year.
document.title: obama stresses immigration benefits at mexico border
lines_and_colors: president barack obama issued an impassioned call for immigration reform in a speech at the u.s.-mexican border on tuesday, sending a message to hispanics whose votes he needs to win re-election next year.
